summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 11, Bell and Denny's Addition, being the alley between Elliott Avenue and Western Avenue, from Clay Street to Cedar Street; by grading and paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 11561 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
